content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of watching movies and therefore do not have the ability to form opinions about the quality of films. However, I can provide information based on my training data that includes recent movies that have gained critical acclaim, such as Parasite, 1917, The Irishman, Joker, Marriage Story, and many others. These films have received awards and nominations from various film festivals and award shows, indicating that they have been well-received by audiences and critics alike.
